ModMetaData.name: RedistHeat
ModMetaData.author: Latta
ModMetaData.description:
This mods adds small/medium/industrial versions of the vanilla temperature buildings. It also adds a duct network to let you build complex systems for temperature control.
Maintainer: Morgloz
Credits -mrCarton, the author of "Central Heating" -justarandomgeek, the author of "Signals, you can't stop them!" -mrofa, who helped me in the pipe's graphic code
